item.title: Compile Linux Kernel on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Linux 内核编译(Ubuntu 环境) 下载内核代码 https://www.kernel.org/ 安装依赖 sudo apt update sudo apt install -y \ gcc \ make \ libncurses5-dev \ openssl \ libssl-dev \ build-essential \ pkg-config \ libc6-dev \ bison \ flex \ libelf-dev 准备.config和自定义配置 cd {Download}/linux-5.4.32/ sudo cp /boot/config-{uname -r} .config sudo make menuconfig 编译内核 # 编译内核 sudo make sudo make modules_install 安装内核 sudo mv {Download}/linux-5.4.32 /usr/src/ cd /usr/src/linux-5.
